pokedexEntries.ruby: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.
pokedexEntries.emerald: When Beldum gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one Pokémon. They communicate with each other using brain waves.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.
pokedexEntries.diamond: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexEntries.pearl: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexEntries.platinum: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
pokedexEntries.black: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexEntries.white: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexEntries.black2: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.
pokedexEntries.white2: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.
pokedexEntries.x: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
pokedexEntries.y: It converses with others by magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses through Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.
pokedexEntries.sun: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.
pokedexEntries.moon: With magnetic traction, it pulls its opponents in close. When they're in range, it slashes them with its rear claws.
pokedexEntries.ultraSun: Instead of blood, magnetism flows through its body. When it’s feeling bad, try giving it a magnet.
pokedexEntries.ultraMoon: If you anger it, it will do more than rampage. It will also burst out strong magnetism, causing nearby machines to break.
